title: Usogui
short_cast: Ryusei Yokohama, Hayato Sano, Mai Shiraishi, Kanata Hongo, Win Morisaki, Kaito Sakurai, Ryo Kimura, Shingo Tsurumi, Hiroaki Murakami, Shohei Miura
cast: Ryusei Yokohama, Hayato Sano, Mai Shiraishi, Kanata Hongo, Win Morisaki, Kaito Sakurai, Ryo Kimura, Shingo Tsurumi, Hiroaki Murakami, Shohei Miura
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 13 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 13
desc: A brilliant gambler goes up against the most diabolical swindlers dominating the country in a fight to win control of a powerful secret organization.
